title: Panic log may be lost when using async logger
body:
## Bug Report

### What version of TiKV are you using?

`187774ed9433af80d117b6576179515b2e24ab6a`

### Steps to reproduce

Start a runner on thread pool to panic as https://github.com/zhongzc/tikv/commit/bcda8dca653988169b96d3cb45e254594520019e.

### What did you expect?

The panic log can be guaranteed to see.

### What did happened?

I couldn't get the `boom!` panic output.
